children.query:
select
	T.fid, 
	isnull(T.fSubject, '***') as fSubject, 
	T.fTag, 
	T.fUserId,
	T.fTimestamp,
	T.fType,
	T.fStatus,
	case when 
		(T.fUserId = cast('@@eSiteLoginId' as int) and T.fReadBy <> cast('@@eSiteLoginId' as int)) or T.fStatus < 2
	then 'style="font-weight:bold"' else '' end as fStyle
from
	dbo.tTickets T WITH (NOLOCK)
where
	[freetext(T.*, '@txt')]
	and (fType & cast('@ticketType' as int) <> 0 or cast('@ticketType' as int) = 0)
	and (fStatus & cast('@ticketStatus' as int) <> 0 or cast('@ticketStatus' as int) = 0)
order by
	 T.fModified desc, T.fStatus,T.fTimestamp desc

children.query:
select 
	T.fId,
	T.fType,
	T.fStatus,
	T.fSubject,
	T.fMessage,
	T.fTag,
	E.fFullName,
	T.fTimestamp,
	case when (T.fStatus < 3 and T.fUserId = cast('@@eSiteLoginId' as int)) or cast('@@eSiteLoginId' as int) = -5 then 1 else 0 end as fEnabled
from
	tTickets T WITH (NOLOCK) 
	left join WebCSAVI.dbo.eSiteEntities E WITH (NOLOCK) on T.fUserId = E.fId
where
	T.fid=cast('@fid' as int)

children.query:
select 
	case when fGroup = 1 then 'fa-users' else 'fa-user' end,
	fId,
	fName,
	fFullname,
	fDescription,
	fEmail,
	fDisabled
from 
	dbo.eSiteEntities  WITH (NOLOCK)
where  
	[(fname like '%@txt%' or ffullname like '%@txt%' or femail like '%@txt%')] and
	fdisabled = case when '@edisabled' = '1' then 1 else 0 end and
	((fgroup + 1) & cast('@etype' as int) > 0 or cast('@etype' as int) = 0)
order by 
	fname

	E.fpassword, 
	E.fid

	eSiteEntities E WITH (NOLOCK)

	[concat(E.ffullname, ' ', E.fname) like '%@txt%']

	and E.fgroup=0 
	and E.fdisabled=0 
order by 
	E.ffullname

children.query:
SELECT * FROM
(SELECT 
	A.fId
	,A.fNome
	,A.fCognome
	,cast(A.fDataNascita as varchar(10)) as fDataNascita
	,A.fCF
	,A.fIndirizzo
	,A.fCAP
	,A.fCitta
	,A.fProvincia
	,A.fTelefono  
	,A.fEmail
	,A.fPEC
	,A.fSito
	,A.fPIVA
	,cast(A.fDataFine as varchar(10)) as fDataFine
	,A.fDati  
FROM 
	dbo.tAnagrafiche AS A WITH (NOLOCK)
	INNER JOIN dbo.tRelazioni AS R WITH (NOLOCK) ON A.fId = R.fIdFiglio
WHERE
	A.fId = CAST('@idPersona@idGenerico' AS INT)
	AND A.fTipo = 2
	AND R.fIdPadre = '@@idOrganizzazione'
UNION
SELECT
	null,
	'Nuova Persona',
	null,
	null,
	null,
	null,
	null,
	null,
	null,
	null,
	null,
	null,
	null,
	null,
	null,
	'<data><idOrganizzazione>@@idOrganizzazione</idOrganizzazione></data>') AS T
ORDER BY
	1 DESC

SELECT * FROM
(SELECT 
	A.fNome
	,A.fCognome
FROM 
	dbo.tAnagrafiche AS A WITH (NOLOCK)
	INNER JOIN dbo.tRelazioni AS R WITH (NOLOCK) ON A.fId = R.fIdFiglio
WHERE
	A.fId = CAST('@idPersona@idGenerico' AS INT)
	AND A.fTipo = 2
	AND R.fIdPadre = '@@idOrganizzazione'

SELECT
	'Nuova Persona',
	null) AS T
ORDER BY 2 DESC

	CO.fIdAnagrafica = CAST('@idPersona' AS INT)
	AND R.fIdPadre = '@@idOrganizzazione'

select
	A.fId,
	CONCAT(A.fNome, ' ', A.fCognome),
	A.fEmail,
	A.fTelefono,
	concat('https://www.google.it/maps/place/', A.fIndirizzo, ' ', A.fCAP,' ', A.fCitta, ' ', A.fProvincia),
	concat(A.fIndirizzo, ' ', A.fCAP,' ', A.fCitta, ' ', A.fProvincia)
from
	dbo.tAnagrafiche AS A WITH (NOLOCK)
	inner join dbo.tRelazioni AS R WITH (NOLOCK) ON A.fId = R.fIdFiglio
where
	R.fTipo = 2
	and [CONCAT(A.fNome, ' ', A.fCognome) like '%@txt%']
	and  R.fIdPadre = '@@idOrganizzazione'
order by

children.query:
IF (EXISTS(SELECT * FROM dbo.tContratti WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE fId = CAST('@fId' AS INT) AND fIdOrganizzazione = CAST('@@idOrganizzazione'AS INT)))
	SELECT
		CO.fIdAnagrafica as idPersona, CL.fTag AS contentContratto, concat(A.fNome, ' ', A.fCognome) as Persona
	FROM 
		dbo.tContratti AS CO WITH (NOLOCK)
		INNER JOIN dbo.tClassificazioni AS CL WITH (NOLOCK) ON CO.fTipo = CL.fId
		INNER JOIN dbo.tAnagrafiche AS A WITH (NOLOCK) ON CO.fIdAnagrafica = A.fId
	WHERE 
		CO.fId = CAST('@fId' AS INT);
ELSE IF ('@fTag' IN (SELECT fTag FROM dbo.tClassificazioni WHERE fPercorso LIKE 'contratti%'))
	SELECT 
		cast('@idPersona' as int) as idPersona, '@fTag' AS contentContratto, V.fFiglio as Persona
	FROM
		dbo.vRelazioni AS V WITH (NOLOCK)
	WHERE
		V.fIdPadre = CAST('@@idOrganizzazione'AS INT)
		AND V.fIdfIGLIO = cast('@idPersona' as int)
		AND V.fTipo = 2;
ELSE 
	SELECT cast('@idPersona' as int) as idPersona, '' AS contentContratto, null as Persona;

SELECT
	concat(right(concat('0', fICNPO), 2), '-' + ICNPO.fISTAT, ' ', ICNPO.fDescrizione) AS ICNPO,
	concat(ATECO.fAteco, ' ', ATECO.fDescrizione) AS ATECO,
	concat(Legge22.fCodice, ' ', Legge22.fDescrizione) AS L22,
	CASE WHEN RC.fDisabilitata = 1 THEN 'text-decoration: line-through;' ELSE '' END AS textDecoration,
	RC.fId
FROM
	dbo.vRelazioniClassificatorie RC
	INNER JOIN dbo.tICNPO ICNPO on RC.fIdICNPO = ICNPO.fId
	left join dbo.tATECO ATECO on RC.fIdATECO = ATECO.fId
	left join dbo.tLegge22 Legge22 on RC.fIdLegge22 = Legge22.fId
WHERE
	CAST(RC.fIdAnag AS VARCHAR(10)) = '@idAttivita'
	AND ISNULL(RC.fDataInizio, CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)) <= CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)
	AND ISNULL(RC.fDataFine, CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)) >= CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)
ORDER BY
	RC.fPrimaria desc, 2

	CONCAT(right(concat('0', fICNPO), 2), '-' + ICNPO.fISTAT, ' ', ICNPO.fDescrizione,'; ', ATECO.fAteco, ' ', ATECO.fDescrizione, '; ',  Legge22.fCodice, ' ', Legge22.fDescrizione) AS Classificazione,
	concat(right(concat('0', fICNPO), 2), '-' + ICNPO.fISTAT, ' ', ICNPO.fDescrizione) AS ICNPO,
	concat(ATECO.fAteco, ' ', ATECO.fDescrizione) AS ATECO,
	concat(Legge22.fCodice, ' ', Legge22.fDescrizione) AS L22,
	VRC.fDisabilitata

	INNER JOIN dbo.tICNPO ICNPO on VRC.fIdICNPO = ICNPO.fId
	left join dbo.tATECO ATECO on VRC.fIdATECO = ATECO.fId
	left join dbo.tLegge22 Legge22 on VRC.fIdLegge22 = Legge22.fId

SELECT REPLACE(CONCAT('',right(concat('0', fICNPO), 2), '-' + ICNPO.fISTAT, ' ', ICNPO.fDescrizione, '
', '', ATECO.fAteco, ' ', ATECO.fDescrizione, '
', '', Legge22.fCodice, ' ', Legge22.fDescrizione), '''', ' ') AS fDescrizioneClassificazione, REPLACE(CONCAT(right(concat('0', fICNPO), 2), '-' + ICNPO.fISTAT, ' ', ICNPO.fDescrizione), '''', ' ') AS ICNPO, REPLACE(CONCAT(ATECO.fAteco, ' ', ATECO.fDescrizione), '''', ' ') AS ATECO, REPLACE(CONCAT(Legge22.fCodice, ' ', Legge22.fDescrizione), '''', ' ') AS L22, REPLACE(CONCAT(right(concat('0', fICNPO), 2), '-' + ICNPO.fISTAT, ' ', ICNPO.fDescrizione, ' ', ATECO.fAteco, ' ', ATECO.fDescrizione, ' ', Legge22.fCodice, ' ', Legge22.fDescrizione), '''',' ') AS fDescrizione, RC.fId FROM dbo.vRelazioniClassificatorie AS RC INNER JOIN dbo.tICNPO ICNPO on RC.fIdICNPO = ICNPO.fId left join dbo.tATECO ATECO on RC.fIdATECO = ATECO.fId left join dbo.tLegge22 Legge22 on RC.fIdLegge22 = Legge22.fId WHERE [CONCAT(right(concat('0', fICNPO), 2), '-' + ICNPO.fISTAT, ' ', ICNPO.fDescrizione, ' ', ATECO.fAteco, ' ', ATECO.fDescrizione, ' ', Legge22.fCodice, ' ', Legge22.fDescrizione) LIKE '%@txt%'] AND CAST(RC.fIdAnag AS VARCHAR(10)) = '@@idOrganizzazione' AND ISNULL(RC.fDataInizio, CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)) <= CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AND ISNULL(RC.fDataFine, CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)) >= CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AND RC.fId NOT IN (SELECT RC2.fIdRelazioneClassificatoria FROM dbo.vRelazioniClassificatorie AS RC2 WHERE RC2.fIdAnag = CAST('@idAttivita' AS INT)) ORDER BY 1, 2

SELECT
	concat(right(concat('0', fICNPO), 2), '-' + ICNPO.fISTAT, ' ', ICNPO.fDescrizione) AS ICNPO,
	concat(ATECO.fAteco, ' ', ATECO.fDescrizione) AS ATECO,
	concat(Legge22.fCodice, ' ', Legge22.fDescrizione) AS L22,
	CASE WHEN RC.fDisabilitata = 1 THEN 'text-decoration: line-through;' ELSE '' END AS textDecoration,
	RC.fId
FROM
	dbo.vRelazioniClassificatorie RC
	INNER JOIN dbo.tICNPO ICNPO on RC.fIdICNPO = ICNPO.fId
	left join dbo.tATECO ATECO on RC.fIdATECO = ATECO.fId
	left join dbo.tLegge22 Legge22 on RC.fIdLegge22 = Legge22.fId
WHERE
	CAST(RC.fIdAnag AS VARCHAR(10)) = '@idAttivita'
	AND ISNULL(RC.fDataInizio, CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)) <= CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)
	AND ISNULL(RC.fDataFine, CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)) >= CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)
ORDER BY
	RC.fPrimaria desc, 2

select
	A.fId AS idAttivita,
	A.fNome,
	A.fEmail,
	A.fTelefono,
	concat(	A.fIndirizzo, ' ', A.fCAP,' ', A.fCitta, ' ', A.fProvincia)
from
	dbo.tAnagrafiche AS A WITH (NOLOCK)
	inner join dbo.tRelazioni AS R WITH (NOLOCK) ON A.fId = R.fIdFiglio

	A.fTipo = 4
	and [A.fNome like '%@txt%']
	and R.fIdPadre = '@@idOrganizzazione'

<script>
function unpackXML(contentId, fieldName) {
	var xml = document.createElement("div");
	xml.innerHTML = document.querySelector("#CC" + contentId + " [name=" + fieldName + "]").value.replace(/<([a-z]+)\/>/gi, '<$1></$1>');

	var els = document.querySelectorAll("#CC" + contentId + " .XMLData");
	for (var i = 0; i < els.length; ++i) {
		var el = els[i];
		if (el.type != "hidden" && el.type != "radio") 
			el.value = "";
		var data = xml.querySelector(el.name.replace("*", ""));
		if (data) {
			if (el.type == "radio" && el.value != data.innerText)
				continue;
			if (el.type == "radio" && el.value == data.innerText)
				el.checked = true;
			else if (el.type == "select-multiple") {
				document.querySelector("#CC" + contentId + " [name=" + el.name.replace("*", "") + "]").value = data.innerText;
				for (var j = 0; j < el.children.length; ++j)
					el.children[j].selected = (data.innerText + ",").indexOf(" " + el.children[j].value + ",") != -1;
			} else
				el.value = data.innerText;
		}
	}
	return true;
}
function packXML(contentId, fieldName) {
	var xml = document.createElement("div");
	xml.innerHTML = document.querySelector("#CC" + contentId + " [name=" + fieldName + "]").value;

	var els = document.querySelectorAll("#CC" + contentId + " .XMLData");
	for (var i = 0; i < els.length; i++) {
		var el = els[i];
			
		if (el.type == "radio" && !el.checked)
			continue;
		if (el.name[0] == "*")
			el = document.querySelector("#CC" + contentId + " [name=" + el.name.replace("*", "") + "]");
		if (!xml.querySelector(el.name))
			xml.firstChild.appendChild(document.createElement(el.name));
		xml.querySelector(el.name).innerText = el.value;
	}
	document.querySelector("#CC" + contentId + " [name='" + fieldName + "']").value = xml.innerHTML;
	return true;
}
</script>

<script>
    function gestisciClassificazione(event, idContent, id) {
        event.preventDefault();
        eSitePopup("/?*r=" + idContent + "&fId=" + id, eSiteSetupPopupList);
    }

    function formaGiuridica() {
        var form = document.getElementsByName("FormaGiuridica")[0].form;
        var valore = parseInt(form.FormaGiuridica.value);

        var display = valore && [19, 20, 21, 22, 23, 60, 112].indexOf(valore) == -1 ? "" : "none"; // Senza Albo: Associazione, Fondazione
        form.AlboNazionaleNumero.previousElementSibling.style.display = display;
        form.AlboNazionaleNumero.style.display = display;
        form.AlboNazionaleData.previousElementSibling.style.display = display;
        form.AlboNazionaleData.style.display = display;
    }

    function qualificaDLGS117() {
        var form = document.getElementsByName("QualificaDLGS117")[0].form;
        var valore = parseInt(form.QualificaDLGS117.value);

        var display = valore && [31, 32, 33, 34, 35].indexOf(valore) == -1 ? "" : "none"; //Imprese sociali
        form.AlboRegionaleNumero.previousElementSibling.style.display = display;
        form.AlboRegionaleNumero.style.display = display;
        form.AlboRegionaleData.previousElementSibling.style.display = display;
        form.AlboRegionaleData.style.display = display;
        form.AlboRegionaleDataFine.previousElementSibling.style.display = display;
        form.AlboRegionaleDataFine.style.display = display;
    }

function controllaDate() {
    let daData = document.getElementsByName("fDataInizio")[0].value;  
    let aData = document.getElementsByName("fDataFine")[0].value;

    if (daData && aData && daData > aData){
         document.getElementsByName("fDataInizio")[0].value = aData;
         document.getElementsByName("fDataFine")[0].value = daData;
    }
}

function resetLivello2(el) {
    el.closest('form').querySelector("input[name='fIdObiettivo']").value = '';
    el.closest('form').querySelector("input[name='Obiettivo']").value = '';
}

function verificaInserimento(el) {
    let fIdObiettivo = el.closest('form').querySelector("input[name='Obiettivo']").value;
    if (!fIdObiettivo){
        el.closest('form').querySelector("input[name='fIdObiettivo']").value = el.closest('form').querySelector("input[name='idMacroObiettivo']").value;
    }
    controllaDate();
}
</script>

SELECT
	R.fId,
	R.fPrimaria,
	R.fIdICNPO,
	concat(right(concat('0', fICNPO), 2), '-' + ICNPO.fISTAT, ' ', ICNPO.fDescrizione) as ICNPO,
	R.fIdATECO,
	concat(ATECO.fATECO, ' ', ATECO.fDescrizione) as ATECO,
	R.fIdLegge22,

	dbo.tRelazioniClassificatorie R

	left join dbo.tATECO ATECO on R.fIdATECO = ATECO.fId
	left join dbo.tLegge22 Legge22 on R.fIdLegge22 = Legge22.fId
WHERE
	cast(R.fId as varchar(10)) = '@fId'

	and fTag = '@idGruppo'
order by
	fDescrizione

layout.it:
\s('caption="Ruoli" key="fId" ')
\the
h('fPercorso;ruoli')
h('fTag;@idGruppo')

b(';Inserisci;;esite;insert;data;select * from dbo.tClassificazioni')p('idGruppo;@@fTag')
b(';Salva;;esite;update;data;select * from dbo.tClassificazioni where fId = cast('@@fId' as int)')p('idGruppo;@@fTag')
